body: Topping the head of this 5-foot-long shaft are three long, backward-curved blades fashioned in the appearance of a blossoming lotus. The unusually large head is designed to land heavy blows and cause multiple wounds that open away from each other.
name: Tri-Point Double-Edged Sword
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Tri-Point Double-Edged Sword
